name: NodeTs
description: const hello:string = "hello, world";   console.log(hello); ## for tsconfig.json, set     "sourceMap": true,     "outDir": "dist",    ## for package.json, add dev devdependencies:     "typescript": "5.3.3" ## for launch.json for vs code debugging. set   "program": "${workspaceFolder}/dist/first.js" ## "yarn install" to install package ## npx tsc to compile the codes. ## now you can debug it
